txt.en: Kyrstig has asked you to defeat the risen dwarves in Akhaldarâg.

'The Angmarim have already raised wights from the ancient dwarves interred in the smaller tombs, like these ones at Akhaldarâg. They must be defeated and the fell spirits within banished, so the dwarves can return to their rest!'

'I have had nightmares before, [placeholder], but none so bad as this. We must do what we can to keep our honoured dead from being used against us in this way! Such terrible enemies we face to conceive of such villainy!'
The tombs at Akhaldarâg are located in the south-west side of the Pit of Stonejaws.
Defeated dwarf-wights in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
